name: HookSync
description:
Grapple hook your way through an atmospheric procedurally generated world inspired by brutalist architecture.

Also inspired by Superflight, and Proteus in some aspects. 

*CONTROLS*

WASD - movement

Right Click to grapple

Ctrl to crouch and slide

CREDITS:

Game made by

 Alejandro Haibi

-Music-

Aces High by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3337-aces-high

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

-Textures-

Contains assets from ambientCG.com, licensed under CC0 1.0 Universal.

https://ambientcg.com

Clouds base scripts by Sebastian Lague

SebLague/Clouds: Cloud rendering test (github.com)
